name: Mercedes
notes: Formed in 1954, withdraw in 1955, then returned in 2010 after buyout of Brawn.

name: Benetton
notes: In 2000, the team was purchased by Renault, but competed as Benetton for the 2000 and 2001 seasons. In 2002, the team became Renault F1.

name: Racing Point
notes: Renamed from Racing Point Force India

name: Stewart
notes: At the end of 1999, Ford bought the team outright and it was renamed Jaguar Racing.

name: Arrows
notes: Arrows was known as Footwork from 1991 to 1996.

name: Footwork
notes: was known as Footwork from 1991 to 1996.

name: Equipe Ligier
notes: Sold to Alain Prost and became Prost Grand Prix in 1997.

name: MRT
notes: Preceeded Virgin, renamed back after takeover by Marussia
